item.title: Loading Twitter Data into Neo4j with APOC
item.description: For the Graph Hack at this years Graph Connect, myself and the Dead Pony Club aimed to combine candidate datasets with donation data, Twitter and fake news sources to attempt to find out which politicians, if any, were directly influenced by fake news. My task for the eveningÂ was to pull Twitter information into our Graph. Being relatively new to the APOC library, I was genuinely surprised as to how easy this could be done with a couple of queries.
